reviews.title: Hruza
reviews.text: Absolutne nepouzitelna aplikace, i po vybrani vychozi sluzby se dana sluzba nenastavi jako vychozi, nelze zaplatit ani zobrazit vyuctovani. Po kliknuti na ikonu uhradit vyuctovani se ukazuje pouze prehled jedne predplacene sim karty a nejde zobrazit ani zaplatit vyuctovani za pausalni sluzby. Jelikoz nefunguje ani zakladni vec jako moznost zaplatit nebo zobrazit vyuctovani nechapu k cemu takova aplikace vlastne vubec existuje. Stara aplikace fungovala, ale ta uz bohuzel nejde zapnout, protoze pouze odkazuje na tuto novou nefunkcni hruzu.

reviews.title: Again useless
reviews.text:
I can no longer use the old app, and now when I was forced to use the new one, I can not even log in to my account, because the app persistently thinks I‚Äôm a bot for for unknown reason. It kindly suggests to adjust cookies, plugins, and what not, in my browser before updating the page, but THERE IS NO BUTTON TO UPDATE THE PAGE, BECAUSE THIS IS NOT A BROWSER! 
Bottom line: amazing experience.
